org.thethingsnetwork.account.sync.auth.grant

Class ApplicationPassword

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thethingsnetwork.account.common.GrantType
      • org.thethingsnetwork.account.sync.auth.grant.ApplicationPassword

  • public class ApplicationPassword
extends GrantType
    This token provider uses application credentials (id + access-key) to generate a token only usable for the owning application
    Author:
    Romain Cambier

                           URI _accountServer)
        Create an instance of this token provider using fully-customized settings
        Parameters:
        _appId - The application id
        _key - The application access-key
        _clientId - The client id you received from the account server
        _clientSecret - The client secret you received from the account server
        _accountServer - The account server to be used
